title: Zero to Production: The Blueprint Behind WattsWise
excerpt: How we architected a complex engineering tool in just 216 hours using AI-driven development.

title: Power Triangle Calculator (1φ/3φ): kW, kVAR, kVA, PF & Current — Bidirectional + Efficiency (η)

title: From “Local LLM” to Agentic Systems: A Hands-On Lab You Can Actually Run
excerpt: A local-first AI engineering lab that progresses from a clean LLM API to research operators, multi-agent orchestration, and an MT5-connected MCP Trading Desk—built to run, inspect, and iterate.
